documents.document: I was going to say id love to see the reaction this bloke would get if he was in the local pub but then I remembered hes the biggest social reject ever and has never entered a pub in his life. https://t.co/Ub9V5jnb6a

Whether we do though is a different matter
Thanks for that government but I think us grown adults know how to behave responsibly without you telling us to https://t.co/KhLdOJA0fT

Seriously i dont care who you are, what your job is, or what your circumstances are. If you have enjoyed a second of lockdown then id suggest looking at getting mental help or even better please stay indoors for the rest of time! https://t.co/cJ8aFW5loY
Just say you have no mates to go down the pub with and move on Dom https://t.co/Sa0R3FVTJc

The vulnerable are now protected, the NHS is no longer overwhelmed (even though I dont think it ever was), if you have the vaccine great and if you dont thats your choice Open the pubs, dont wear a mask, dont social distance and enjoy a few pints

What the fuck is going on man? The pubs are opening with stricter rules than what they closed with ffs. Has anyone ever stopped and thought hang on we have vaccinated over half the country its about time we can go to the pub without being treat like its a prison camp.
@REM831119 Already seen a pub in liverpool try and claim its the guidelines to wear masks outside
@PoliticsForAlI Check his blood pressure ASAP!!!

Now Im all for getting back to the pubs we love and helping them out after the toughest year yet. However you just know there will be some pubs probably enforcing masks outside, checking peoples phones for track trace etc. If thats your pub then you deserve nothing!

@notadoomster Honestly I cant believe it. I felt bad going for the vaccine anyway because Im nowhere near vulnerable and nowhere near the age group needed but its due to work. Every single nurse aswell not even 1 or 2, all of them double masked up
Second dose of the vaccine completed for me today! On a bad note though, all nurses double masked up ffs. What on earth are we up against man and what chance do we ever stand??

The worst part it during all this Ive always felt Boris Johnson deep down knows this full thing is a bunch of power tripped scientists trying to stay relevant. Sadly Boris Johnson hasnt grown a backbone throughout the full thing and still bows down to them! https://t.co/y745R8If08
Disgusting, how these bastards keep getting away with this is beyond me. https://t.co/hFyQlt5fCn
RT @SkyNews: "There is no evidence that general wearing of face masks by the public who are well stops the spread of COVID-19... what matte

Ive got a brother in secondary school, he said no one wears a mask anyway. However it is annoying that we are told these things will be looked and reviewed however I havent seen one piece of evidence for masks working within school classrooms?

It might seem like its never going to happen but trust me one day very soon, this country will fight back against the lunatics in charge of it! People have had enough and the majority are finally realising the lies within the roadmap. We will rise #EnoughIsEnough

Does Boris actually want these vaccine passports or do we just think its another idea from the social rejects advising Government? Like the past year though, we all know whatever Sage and the Scientists want, they will get!

Seems like the vaccinated will be able to travel away this year. A kick in the bollocks to the younguns who have sacrificed an awful lot this year just to be told they cant enjoy a summer holiday because they wont have the vaccine.

Chris Whitty knocks me sick. Blokes on TV telling us it can still be dangerous for us to be walking in a park with someone and not socially distancing. Resign you utter clown.

23 deaths in the whole UK today, never nice to think about or say but we are miles past the point where we have an acceptable level of deaths. We have the same with flu etc so now its time to do the same with Covid. Also deaths are only going to get lower with the vaccine.

Not once, seen right through the full shitshow before it even came to Britain. https://t.co/ftiDYJd8IS
Imagine if someone told you in July 2020 we would have half the nation vaccinated already! Youd of thought we were packing out pubs, stadiums, theatres etc months ago. Yet here we are.
Lifes never going back to normal is it, its crazy how in June/July last year I was more optimistic about returning to normal life than I am now with over half the nation vaccinated ffs.

That doesnt sound like the normal life we were promised! Im fine about foreign travel stopping if there is actually a risk but dont make it sound like its a solution for giving us our simple freedoms back over the summer.Everything should be open domestically no matter what https://t.co/Z6vrqJ6D6B

Last tweet took out of context slightly, In short- you want to carry a card round saying youve had the vaccine then do it. Should it be required to get entry into anywhere? Absolutely not
